intension: Create an Instagram story to promote a special offer of 30% discount on the autumn collection. Encourage users to visit the website by including a link in bio.
globalcaption: The image features a woman wearing a yellow shirt and brown pants, standing on one leg and holding her other leg up. She is wearing a pair of white shoes and appears to be dancing or performing a pose. The woman is the main focus of the image, and her outfit and pose create a visually appealing scene.
keywords: autumn, fall, offer, seasonal, tb, sale, discount, woman, collection, clothing, fashion, style, instagram, insta, ig, story

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a white background with a few decorative elements. There are three leafy plants, each with a single leaf, placed at different positions on the background. Additionally, there are three small circles, possibly representing planets or other celestial objects, scattered across the background. The combination of the leafy plants and celestial objects creates a visually appealing and artistic scene

objlayer.objcaption: The image features a woman standing in a white room, wearing a yellow shirt and brown pants. She is posing for the camera, with her hands on her hips. The woman is wearing white shoes, which complement her outfit. The room appears to be a plain, white background, allowing the focus to be on the woman and her attire

body.text: for a limited time, enjoy a 30% discount on our autumn collection
